Description:
IN.CMG.250122.A-312205184 - WITHDRAWN
You have failed to ensure that the exposure of your employees to substances hazardous to health, namely various softwood, and hardwood dusts during the operation of circular saw machines, is either prevented, or, where this is not reasonably practicable, adequately controlled.

IN.CMG.250122.B-312205327 - WITHDRAWN 
You have failed to ensure that the exposure of your employees to substances hazardous to health, namely various softwood and hardwood dusts during the use of handheld sanders, is either prevented, or, where this is not reasonably practicable, adequately controlled.

IN.CMG.270122.A-312221535
You have failed to ensure that the exposure of your employees to substances hazardous to health, namely various softwood, and hardwood dusts during the operation of chop saw machines, is either prevented, or, where this is not reasonably practicable, adequately controlled.

IN.CMG.270122.B - 312221584
You have failed to ensure that the exposure of your employees to substances hazardous to health, namely various softwood and hardwood dusts during the use of handheld sanders, is either prevented, or, where this is not reasonably practicable, adequately controlled.
